message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure if the product is worth $20,000 to me. I'd be willing to consider purchasing it for $12,000. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is really my bottom line. I can't go lower than $18,000. This product is worth every penny.
I understand that you're attached to the product, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $18,000 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,500. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
